title: Nigeria's NNPC, Nigeria LNG sign $2.5 bln pre-payment deal - NNPC
text:
Nigeria's NNPC, Nigeria LNG sign $2.5 bln pre-payment deal - NNPC

Commodities 4 hours ago (Oct 11, 2019 10:40)

© Reuters. Nigeria's NNPC, Nigeria LNG sign $2.5 bln pre-payment deal - NNPC LAGOS, Oct 11 (Reuters) - Nigeria's state oil company on Friday said it had signed a $2.5 billion pre-payment agreement with Nigeria LNG. The agreement is "for upstream gas development projects to supply trains 1-6", Nigerian National Petroleum Corp (NNPC) said on Twitter. Nigeria was the fifth-largest liquefied natural gas producer in the world last year.

Nigeria's NNPC, Nigeria LNG sign $2.5 bln pre-payment deal - NNPC
description: Nigeria's NNPC, Nigeria LNG sign $2.5 bln pre-payment deal - NNPC
